
XTAL only Image Updates

v1.3.0 / 7-August-2025
1. Enable CM4 cache.

* INFO1 information on successful install:
 INFO1_EXTIMGTYPE0: 0x01
 INFO1_EXTIMGVERSION0: 0x01030000
 INFO1_EXTIMGSTARTADDR0: 0x005FC000
 INFO1_EXTIMGENDADDR0: 0x005FFFFF

v1.2.0 / 23-June-2025
1. Corrected the reported version number of the image.

* INFO1 information on successful install:
 INFO1_EXTIMGTYPE0: 0x01
 INFO1_EXTIMGVERSION0: 0x01020000
 INFO1_EXTIMGSTARTADDR0: 0x005FC000
 INFO1_EXTIMGENDADDR0: 0x005FFFFF

v1.1.0 / 13-June-2025
1. Factory installed image for CM4
   Supports crystal oscillator clock enable/disable and trim configuration requests through mailbox.

* INFO1 information reported:
 INFO1_EXTIMGTYPE0: 0x01
 INFO1_EXTIMGVERSION0: 0x00000102
 INFO1_EXTIMGSTARTADDR0: 0x005FC000
 INFO1_EXTIMGENDADDR0: 0x005FFFFF
